name: daily video: This video include both indoor (such as a shopping mall) or outdoor scenes as well as day and night-time scenes.
abuse: This video shows bad, cruel or violent behavior against children, old people, animals, women.
arrest: This video shows police arresting individuals.
assault: This video shows a sudden or violent physical attack on someone.
burglary: This video shows people (thieves) entering into a building or house with the intention to commit theft.
fighting: This video displays two or more people attacking one another.
robbery: This video shows thieves taking money unlawfully by force or threat of force.
shooting: This video shows act of shooting someone with a gun.
